name: Cannon Tower 4.0
description:
Cannon Tower! (4.0)

Multiplayer Controls:

  • Player 1: A and D to roll left and right, W to shoot.
  • Player 2: < and > arrows to roll left and right, ^ arrow to shoot.

Singleplayer Controls:

  •  A and D to roll left and right, W to shoot.

Objective:

  • Knock the other player off of their tower by shooting them or their tower with a cannonball.
  • Don't touch the ground.

2.0 Update Changelog:

  • Ground is now red
  • Cannons roll slightly faster
  • Camera scrolling added
  • Space now starts the game from the menu and starts the rematch from the win screen
  • Removed the menu button from the rematch screen as it couldn't actually be pressed and it also sent you back to a menu with literally one button on it.

There are no screenshots of this version because I'm too lazy to take them. If you want, take them and post them in a comment so I can add them to this page.

3.0 Update Changelog:

  • Added powerups - Jetpack, Machine Gun, Homing Missile, Life Raft, Force Field
  • Added options menu - toggle powerups and change initial lives.
  • You can now press backspace to go back from the options menu, o to go to options from main menu, p to toggle powerups from the options menu, and 1-9 to set lives from 1-9 from the options menu, and 0 to set lives to 10 from the options menu.

4.0 Update Changelog:

  • Added singleplayer mode - play against a bot! (This mode is very hard)
  • Added nightmare mode - when in singleplayer, you can turn on nightmare mode to turn on the bot's nightmare mode! (This mode is even harder)
  • You can now press s to toggle singleplayer from the options menu, and n to toggle nightmare mode from the options menu.

Future plans:

  • Add maps
  • Change the bot's name to Norman in the next build
  • Add more powerups
  • Add easy bot?
